t: Copycat Gear in Startup Nation - Outside Online
s: September 14, 2022 - Wozer also takes exception to the parasitic nature of some startups. Some Amazon sellers (not Outdoor Vitals or Paria) copy entire pages of educational content from the websites of established brands, and list products using keywords borrowed from the bigger names.
